title: Tallupooh
author: Tallupooh
content: I really like korean dramas whose title is goblin, twenty five twenty one, sparks of love, also we are all dead. recommend by you a fun comedy, romance or horror drama for me.

comments.author: Bazzu
comments.created_time: November 06, 2022, 05:31:28 AMLast edit: November 06, 2022, 05:45:53 AM by Bazzu
comments.body: I rarely watch Korean dramas because I'm always busy at work, but II like Korean dramas, but in the past when I had free time I always watched Korean dramas with my family, and my favorite drama film was Boys Over Flowers. I think the drama film Boys Over Flowers is very good and the storyline is very interesting.

comments.author: devil2man
comments.body: korean dramis are beautiful to watch a way to pass the time in carefree i hope to have more time in the future to watch them

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Korean dramas that I can suggest to you is Happiness with Han Hyo-joo and Park Hyung-sik.My Name with Han So-hee and Park Hee-soon.Healer with Park Min-young and Yoo Ji-tae.Business Proposal with Kim Se-jeong, Ahn Hyo-seop, and Seol In-ah.Descendants of the Sun with Song Hye-ko.Hometown Cha-Cha-Cha with Shin Min-ah and Kim Seon-ho.

comments.author: Sayakaaja
comments.body: I rarely watch Korean dramas, but I recommend you the drama Crush Landing on You. This drama is very good, equipped with a romantic comedy as well as the military

comments.author: smiletyson
comments.body: I am surprised by how many Korean Dramas are on Netflix, Disney+ and Amazon. The industry in Korea must be very big. I watched couple of series on Netflix and it was actually quite good.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Some more Korean dramas I suggest for you watch is Signal with Lee Je-hoon and Kim Hye-soo.Flower of Evil with Moon Chae-won and Lee Joon-gi.Crash Landing on You with Son Ye-jin and Hyun Bin.Coffee Prince with Gong Yoo and Yoon Eun-hye.True Beauty with Moon Ga-young, Cha Eun-woo, and Hwang In-youp.Her Private Life with Park Min-young and Kim Jae-Wook.Run On with Shin Se-Kyung and Im Si-Wan.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: The dramas that I recommend are, true beauty, strong woman the bong soon, and sweet home.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: I like watching Korean dramas, and my favorite dramas are welcome to Waikiki and the sound of your heart.

comments.author: yusrime
comments.body: love to watch faith tv series,fighting scenes are amazing

comments.author: rememberwhen
comments.body: I started watching Korean drama during the pandemic and until now because I was captured by their drama stories especially their actors they are so beautiful. I am also fan of romantic - comedy and if there is a drama that I would recommend which is also my favorite dramas areIt's okay not to be okayFight for my wayMr. Queen.

comments.author: Klima Dorres
comments.body: Yep . I like drama "Oh My Ghost" (오 나의 귀신님) because it have comedy, romance, and horror. For me, It's a lighthearted, fun drama that also has some spooky elements. Just pass the time.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: I just watch korean drama for there romance acting, there kissing scenes , on youtube

comments.author: ndutndut
comments.body: i don't like korean drama. I'm afraid of addiction
